controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class acts as controller for game keeping the game loop running and holding references to both model and view entities. Used to initiate a game/pause/continue or bring up options

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static GameMode GAME_MODE 
      static int i 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Controller()
      Initiates a world model and sets internally the loader to the globally available

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void continueCallBack()
      Continue game - does nothing now because booleans statemetns set in main game loop should probably be moved into this method for modularity....
      void drawEntities()
      Iterate through animals in model and call draw for each in the view
      void exitCallBack()
      Exit game by calling close on the main window
      void initGame()
      Set level specific features such as player and adds it to the view for input reading and the model
      void intializeWorld()
      Initialize world by opening a frame object setting relevant data and loading in the animaions and background
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Main entrance...
      void playAgainCallBack()
      Restart game
      void run()
      Main game loop, reads input, steps through model, calls draw for the view, and checks relevant win/pause conditions
